column1: Apex Short Sleeve Summer Race Suit
column4:
We pioneered "race suit" technology when we introduced the original summer race suit in 2007. Back then we called it the "criterium suit" thinking that racers would only wear it in short distance events. Little did we know the pro riders made our race suit their go-to garment for every type of event, from criteriums to 5+ hour mountainous road races. Why? Because they wanted a tight-fitting yet comfortable, aerodynamic suit.


The Apex Summer Race Suit is the ultimate in one-piece race suit technology. The front of the top, sleeves and sidepanels/leg bands are all made from our CS TechMesh, a lycra-mesh fabric with millions of tiny air holes to keep you cool. There are two rear pockets to carry bottles, etc.


Features:

  • CS TechMesh fabric on the front of the top, sleeves and short side panels/leg bands
  • CS Contour lycra on the back of the top for UV protection
  • Flatlock stitching
  • Heat-sealed no-collar design
  • 2 rear pockets
  • Extended front zipper to allow for "nature breaks

Designed specifically for the cyclocross racer in mind. Take our regular skinsuit but fleece line it for the ultimate in warmth during the cold cyclocross season.


Features:



  • unlimited number of colours

  • entire suit is fleece-lined for warmth

  • available with either Veloce, Granfondo or Donna Forte Chamois 

  • 4-Way® stretch chamois 

  • no extra charge for colored shorts

  • no extra charge for back panel printing

  • no extra charge for full long-sleeve artwork

  • Note: The skinsuit picture on the left is the design we made for current World Junior Champion Tijmen Eising of Team Revor. We don't make a "pro" and "amateur" uniform - you will be racing in the same cyclocross skinsuit as a world champion!

Features:



  • Unlimited number of colours

  • 4-Way® stretch specific chamois

  • Standard elastic leg grippers

  • lycra colors available in black, red, blue, navy, green and gray

The Apex Short Sleeve Race Suit is the ultimate in one-piece race suit technology. The suit is totally constructed from CS Contour Lycra. There are two rear pockets to carry bottles, etc.


Features:

  • CS Contour Lycra top and bottom
  • Flatlock stitching
  • Heat-sealed no-collar design
  • 2 rear pockets
  • Extended front zipper to allow for "nature breaks"
  • Laser cut leg with injected silicone gripper
  • Injected gripper in sleeve cuff

An addition to our growing range of Cyclo Cross specific garments. This piece is a lighter weight version of our CX Skinsuit for use in warmer climates. Features our exclusive CS Contour lycra all over ensuring a snug and comfortable no matter if you are the bike or on foot. The Leggera skinsuit also features a ¾ sleeve.



- CS Contour Lycra body, sleeves and bottom


- ¾ Cyclo cross specific sleeves


- YKK front zipper


- 2 rear pockets for bidon or fuel storage during the race


- Elastic silicone dot grippers keeping the bottom firmly in place whilst riding and running.

A truly high end, technical performance garment, designed in conjunction with our Pro teams and has been extensively wind tunnel tested. The Rear Zip Speed Suit is designed specifically for the elite time trialist or track rider looking for the extra couple of percent against the clock.


The Carbon Rear Zip Speedsuit features:

  • CS CARBON material, a material that contains threads of carbon within its structure that provides additional compression and thermoregulatory properties.
  • CS CARBON reduces temperature loss or gain keeping the working muscles at optimum temperature for increased performance.
  • Sleeves are made from and CS Dimple fabric and aero type fabric high in lycra content allowing maximal contact to the skin allowing low drag.
  • CS Dimple fabric is featured on rear of the suit to facilitate air flow.
  • CS Tech Mesh utilized in the rear of the legs for increased ventilation.
  • Contour lycra is featured on the front of the suit.
  • The rear zip feature helps reduces drag for the ultimate in aero benefits.
  • This speedsuit is ergonomically shaped to fit whilst in the tucked TT riding position.
  • 4-way stretch specific speedsuit chamois.
  • Silicone Fabric Injection grippers on legs.
  • YKK REAR zip.

Have you noticed the pro riders wearing special skinsuits in time trials? We have and now we make the same style skinsuit. Made from a special wind tunnel-tested dimple fabric developed by the Swiss company Eschler, the CS Speed Suit is a must for any serious time trial or track rider.


* This suit is designed specifically for the elite rider. It is designed to be worn on the bike - it is hard to put on and it is tight.


Features:



  • Unlimited number of colours

  • 4-way stretch specific speedsuit chamois


  • Fabric injection leg grippers

  • Escheler dimple fabric for a proven aerodynamic advantage


Click here to see a picture of Word Pursuit Record holder Jack Bobridge using the same Champion System custom speed suit on route to smashing the world record.
